row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.HPQC_ATTACH_RESOURCE
row.description: Attach the binary for HPQC package

row.process:
:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.STORE" ,"HPQCTOOL", C, N
! Setting jar class path into variable :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR#= STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#,"hpqc-tool.jar")
